articles.description: In the first quarter of FY24, Indias top five IT exporters — Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, HCLTech, Wipro and Tech Mahindra — reported a cumulative dip of 21,838 in net headcount.
articles.content: Hiring by Indias top IT exporters is expected to drop by nearly 40% on-year in the current fiscal, underscoring the demand uncertainty and slowdown in technology services that is weighing down the $2… [+3976 chars]

articles.title: Mahindra Thar.e unveiling on August 15; teaser builds suspense - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The automaker has not revealed any specific details about the car. Although the brief video teaser maintains a degree of mystery, it does offer a sneak peek into what can be expected from the electric Thar, building anticipation.

articles.title: Tata Motors to bolster sales infra as it looks to tap demand for EVs from smaller cities - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The company, which ended the first quarter with sales of around 19,000 electric vehicle units, is also looking to have a separate sales infrastructure for its electric vehicle portfolio going ahead.
articles.content: Tata Motors is looking to expand sales outlets in Tier II and Tier III cities in order to cater to the increased demand for its electric model range from such locations, according to a top company ex… [+2856 chars]

articles.author: Latha Venkatesh
articles.title: Expect a hawkish RBI in the upcoming policy - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The upcoming RBI monetary policy is expected to maintain a status quo on repo rate and stance. Rising food inflation and potential disruptions in commodity prices may lead the governor to adopt a cautious (hawkish) tone.
